code: import React,{useState}from'react';import"../main.css";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Settings=_ref=>{let{workTime,breakTime,setWorkTime,setBreakTime}=_ref;const[tempWorkTime,setTempWorkTime]=useState(workTime/60);const[tempBreakTime,setTempBreakTime]=useState(breakTime/60);const handleApply=()=>{playSound2();setWorkTime(tempWorkTime*60);setBreakTime(tempBreakTime*60);};const playSound2=()=>{const audio=new Audio('click_sound.mp3');audio.play();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:"30px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Work Time (minutes): "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:tempWorkTime,onChange:e=>setTempWorkTime(e.target.value),className:"input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Break Time (minutes): "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:tempBreakTime,onChange:e=>setTempBreakTime(e.target.value),className:"input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:playSound2,children:"Go Back"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:handleApply,children:"Apply"})]})});};export default Settings;
